channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The value of artifacts
item.description: An artifact is an object that holds or signifies an idea. A book on paper is an artifact: it’s the object plus the words. Now that you can get the wor...

item.title: How Jay Graber Is Making Sure Bluesky Never Turns Into Elon Musk’s X
item.description: Since Elon Musk torpedoed Twitter, Bluesky has seen a stunning surge. CEO Jay Graber is working on “billionaire-proofing” social media against any sim...

item.title: Why The Public And Private Sectors Must Jointly Define Responsible AI
item.description: Transparency is not only a regulatory necessity—it's a competitive advantage.

item.title: The system has fingerprints

item.title: Adding To The Utility Belt: Tools Powering Grid Resiliency
item.description: As temperatures soar from the effects of climate change, energy demand escalates and the urgency to find solutions accelerates.

item.title: Five Predictions Shaping The Future Of Mobility And IoT In 2025
item.description: These converging trends point toward a future where connectivity is not just pervasive but also secure, efficient and environmentally conscious.

item.title: “Does it work?”
